attributes.action: Forget the idea of road pricing and actually create a vast and excellent public transport system which will encourage drivers to use their cars less
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We petition the Prime Minister to forget any idea of road pricing but rather to instigate the creation of a viable, excellent, affordable and convenient public transport system, which will encourage drivers to use public transport rather than their cars. In so doing we are asking the Prime Minister to approach the subject of congestion with the mind that people do not need to be forced to understand the importance of reducing congestion, but rather, that they need to have a viable alternative to cars in order to avoid the use of their cars.

rejection.details:
There are lots of petitions on this topic:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=road+pricing
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
